abstract: Chinese prosecutors announce detention of Liao Hong and Chen Zhixia, respective president and vice president of online arm of state newspaper People's Daily, on suspicion of taking bribes.
lead_paragraph: The announcement did not detail the accusations against the two employees of People’s Daily’s online operation.

headline.main: China Investigates Top Executives of Communist Paper’s Website
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Media Officials Investigated

snippet: The announcement did not detail the accusations against the two employees of People’s Daily’s online operation.
